definitions.text: emitting or reflecting light readily or in large amounts
examples: the sun was bright and hot

definitions.text: characterized by quickness and ease in learning
examples: some children are brighter in one subject than another
smart children talk earlier than the average

definitions.text: having lots of light either natural or artificial
examples: the room was bright and airy

definitions.text: made smooth and bright by or as if by rubbing; reflecting a sheen or glow
examples: she brushed her hair until it fell in lustrous auburn waves
the bright stars of stage and screen

definitions.text: not made dim or less bright
examples: surprisingly the curtain started to rise while the houselights were still undimmed
the bright sound of the trumpet section
the brilliant sound of the trumpets
all the world seems bright and gay
had a bright future in publishing
the scandal threatened an abrupt end to a promising political career
a hopeful new singer on Broadway
